attributes.action: Give Police Community Support Officers a national set of powers and national pay structure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present all Police forces across England & Wales employing PCSO's have the right to decide which powers are conferred on their officers and how much they are paid. Many forces have chosen to provide officers with minimal powers and therefore offer poor value for money to the taxpayer. PCSO's do not have an adequate level of Police powers with which to do their job and tackle the issues they are required to deal with.
